description: Try our easy to follow Lamington Muffins recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lamington Muffins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 75g shredded coconut (save 32g shredded coconut for later)

recipeInstructions.text: Sift flour, cocoa and soda together over butter mixture. Stir in until just combined. Add coconut and milk and fold in. Spoon batter into paper cases until one-third full. Spoon 1 tsp of jam into the centre of each muffin. Top with more batter, covering jam until two-third's full. Bake for 20 minutes or until cooked through. Transfer to a wire rack to cool.

Combine chocolate and cream in a bowl over a saucepan of simmering water, ensuring base of bowl does not touch water. Stir until smooth. Remove from heat and cool. Stand, stirring occasionally, until spreadable.
Spread frosting over cupcakes and sprinkle with extra coconut.
